nosotros.visionText: To be the leading company in Mexican vegetable exports, recognized for our commitment to sustainability and operational excellence.

proceso.description: A meticulous process that guarantees the highest quality and freshness, with complete traceability at every stage of the supply chain.

pasos.descripcion: We work with certified producers who meet our quality and sustainability standards.
We supervise every stage of cultivation with sustainable techniques and constant quality monitoring.
We harvest at the optimal ripening moment to guarantee maximum quality and freshness.
We process and package with cutting-edge technology in internationally certified facilities.
We perform multiple quality controls to ensure each product meets international standards.
We manage complete logistics to the final destination, maintaining the cold chain and traceability.

capacidad.description: Robust logistics infrastructure and optimized processes that guarantee consistent deliveries and scalability to meet global demand.

items.descripcion: Optimized load capacity to maintain constant frequencies and meet international delivery schedules
Comprehensive traceability system that documents every stage of the production and logistics process with digital certification
Flexible infrastructure that adapts to variable volumes, from small orders to large-scale institutional contracts

certification.description: We have a network of fields and packing facilities certified under international standards such as GlobalG.A.P. and HACCP, ensuring the highest standards of quality and food safety.

compromiso.description: More than exporting vegetables, we build a sustainable future for Mexican agriculture with social and environmental responsibility in every decision.

items.descripcion: Complete tracking from seed to final consumer with QR codes and digital certifications.
Specialized laboratories and international certifications that guarantee excellence in every product.
Smart irrigation systems and conservation techniques that reduce water consumption by 40%.
Organic and regenerative practices that preserve biodiversity and improve soil quality.
Fair prices for producers and dignified working conditions that strengthen rural communities.
Constant investment in cutting-edge technology to optimize processes and reduce environmental impact.

section1.title: 1. Identity and Address of the Data Controller
section1.content: Verdantia (hereinafter, "the Company"), with address at Av. Florencia #680-A, Res. Campestre, Irapuato, Gto. Mexico, is responsible for the processing of your personal data.

section2.title: 2. Personal Data Collected
section2.content: For the purposes set forth in this notice, we may collect your personal data in various ways: when you provide them directly through our contact form or when we obtain information through other sources permitted by law.

section3.title: 3. Purposes of Processing
section3.content: Your personal data will be used for the following primary purposes:
items: Provide the services and products you have requested.
Notify you about new products or services related to those already contracted or acquired.
Conduct periodic evaluations of our products and services to improve their quality.

section4.title: 4. ARCO Rights
section4.content: You have the right to access, rectify, and cancel your personal data, as well as to oppose their processing or revoke the consent you have granted for this purpose, through the procedures we have implemented. To learn about these procedures, requirements, and deadlines, you can contact our personal data department at: francisco.a.verdantia@outlook.com.

section5.title: 5. Data Transfer
section5.content: We inform you that your personal data will not be transferred to third parties or processed inside or outside the country by persons other than this company, without your prior consent, except for the exceptions provided by Law.
